definitions.definition: a large group of people who have come together:
examples: A crowd of about 15,000 attended the concert.

definitions.definition: a group of friends or a group of people with similar interests:
examples: She goes around with a friendly crowd.

definitions.definition: to make someone feel uncomfortable by standing too close to them or by watching them all the time:
examples: I need some time to do this work properly, so don't crowd me.
